inputAnalysis.detectedScope: Single course syllabus with combined lecture and tutorial hours

metadata.description: Study of past events, particularly in human affairs
Focus on the emergence, diffusion, and mutation of the Greek polis during the Archaic period

subdirectories.path: History/Ancient Greek History/Emergence of the Polis

metadata.description: Analysis of social conflicts and resulting political and institutional changes in Greek city-states
